landing.introduction: With a range of built-in and extensible Modes, Piramyd Agent lets you plan, architect, code, debug and boost your productivity like never before.
landing.accountMention: To get started, enter your Piramyd API Key or login to your account.

providerSignup.heading: Configure Piramyd
providerSignup.chooseProvider: Piramyd Agent is powered by the Piramyd API. Please provide your API key to begin.
providerSignup.piramydDescription: Unlimited access to elite models at an affordable price.

waitingForCloud.heading: Logging into Piramyd...
waitingForCloud.description: We'll take you to your browser to sign up for Piramyd. We'll then bring you back here to finish.
waitingForCloud.noPrompt: If you don't get prompted to open a URL, <clickHere>click here</clickHere>.
waitingForCloud.havingTrouble: If you've completed sign up but are having trouble, <clickHere>click here</clickHere>.
waitingForCloud.pasteUrl: Paste the callback URL shown in your browser:
waitingForCloud.invalidURL: That doesn't look like a valid callback URL. Please copy what Piramyd is showing in your browser.

telemetry.helpImproveMessage: Piramyd Agent collects error and usage data to help us fix bugs and improve the extension. This telemetry does not collect code, prompts or personal information. You can turn this off in <settingsLink>settings</settingsLink>.
